thread.title: Markie Dixon
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Markie Dixon

author: Markie Dixon
title: Markie Dixon
text:
We LOVE White Mountain Puzzles! They are a great weight, good size and are well-cut so that they fit together smoothly. The graphics are sharp and colorful. Your product is very high quality and give us many hours of enjoyment.
Rich and Markie Dixon
